item.title: Reinforcement Learning : Theory and the CartPole game
item.description: What is Reinforcement Learning ? Introduction This will basically serve as a toolbox / summary of what I’ve learned about Reinforcement Learning either throughout the course or with my own exploration. I was extremely excited witht the idea of learning more about Reinforcement Learning : ever since I discovered the potential of Artficial Intelligence and Machine Learning, I was blown away by how people were actually programming AI to play games.
